About the designer: Creative director since 2015, Demna Gvasalia continues Balenciaga’s tradition of extreme experimentation, bringing his uniquely subversive vision to the storied French house. Merging the worlds of streetwear and high fashion, and blatantly disregarding industry conventions, Gvasalia reconfigures the label’s archival pieces with signature exaggerated silhouettes, asymmetric cuts, and acid colorways. Androgynous blazers, trench coats, and wool overcoats are cut in oversized shapes, while t-shirts, hoodies, and knitwear feature signature logo graphics.

products.name: x REVOLVE Edison Mini Dress
products.brandedName: Amanda Uprichard x REVOLVE Edison Mini Dress
products.description: x REVOLVE Edison Mini Dress x REVOLVE Edison Mini Dress 100% polyester Lining: 100% polyester. Made in U.S.A. Dry clean recommended. Double lined. Hidden back zipper closure. Gold-tone buckle detail at neckline. Midweight crepe fabric with notched hem. Neckline to hem measures approx 52.5 in length. AMAN-WD1718. CI-21775. The Amanda Uprichard brand begins with Amanda. Born and raised in Florida, Amanda moved to New York City with a goal of having a creative and exciting life in fashion. After attending Parsons School of Design, Amanda's vision evolved as she drew inspiration from the fast-paced Manhattan lifestyle. Her namesake brand officially launched in 2008 - a luxe clothing line for women inspired by the independent, trendy woman on-the-go. Her use of intricate details, feminine silhouettes and bold hues defines the brand for what is - a celebration of sexy, feminine, fun.

products.name: Pryce Off-Shoulder Satin Column Gown
products.brandedName: Amsale Pryce Off-Shoulder Satin Column Gown
products.description: Silky and off-the-shoulder, the Amsale Pryce Satin Column Gown evokes elegance and simplicity while ensuring easy movement. The asymmetrical draped neckline falls to sleeves that gently land at the elbow, offering an ideal amount of coverage. Fitted at the waist and hips and cascading down to the floor, this gown makes a stunning option for mothers of the bride or groom. products.name: Avenue no.29 Double Breasted Cape With Belt - Blue
products.brandedName: Avenue no.29 Double Breasted Cape With Belt - Blue
products.unbrandedName: Avenue no.29 Double Breasted Cape With Belt - Blue
products.description: Crafted in wool blend, this double breasted cape with matching belt and contrast buttons is a surely a statement piece! The innovative design features minimalistic lines with welt pockets, rounded collar and a ruffled hem. The outer wool blend fabric has a water repellent finish while the viscose lining is manually quilted with an insulating layer that keeps away the cold weather. A very elegant yet contemporary piece to add to your wardrobe and elevate your night out looks. Composition: Outer: 40% virgin wool / 60% acryl, sourced in Italy; Inner: 100% Italy sourced viscose Designed and Manufactured in Romania; Care instructions: Do not wash; do not tumble dry; do not bleach; iron at medium temperature; dry cleaning solvent other than trichloroethylene;

products.aiDescription: Introducing the Margerite Pleated Column Gown from Kay Unger, available exclusively at Saks Fifth Avenue. This stunning gown is perfect for any formal occasion, crafted from stretch crepe and adorned with pleating at the bodice and a chic asymmetric neck. The elbow-length sleeves and side slit add a touch of elegance, while the zip-back ensures a perfect fit. With a true-to-size Missy fit and measurements of about 60" from shoulder to hem, 19.5" bust, 29.5" waist, and 40" hips, this gown is sure to turn heads. Dry clean only. This is a women's favorite.
